description: A zesty and refreshing crunchy salad, elevated by the addition of fresh fruit.
name: Salad with Couscous, Apple, Orange, Pomegranate & Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium apple, cored and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the couscous as per packet instructions using the vegetable stock which should take about 10 minutes.

Once the couscous is cooked, drain the liquid and allow to cool while you prepare your fruit. Peel, wash and slice your fruit and combine with the cooled couscous. Serve drizzled with some orange juice to serve.
